trans-unit.source: Read the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A> property in an event handler to determine whether the sign-out was initiated by the IP (a sign-out clean-up request message was received by the RP), or whether the sign-out was initiated by the relying party (RP).
trans-unit.target: 讀取<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A>屬性中的事件處理常式，以判斷是否登出由所起始的 IP （登出清除要求訊息已收到 RP），或是否登出由所起始的信賴憑證者的合作對象 (RP)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if sign-out was requested by the IP; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果登出是由 IP 要求的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs" /> class by using a value that specifies whether sign-out was requested by the identity provider (IP).
trans-unit.target: 使用值，指出登出是否由識別提供者 (IP) 所要求，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A> property is set to the value of the `isIPInitiated` parameter.
Gets a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs" /> that indicates sign-out was initiated by the identity provider (IP).
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs" />，表示登出是由識別提供者 (IP) 所啟始。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs" /> that has its <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated" /> property set <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 其 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether sign-out was initiated by the identity provider (IP) via a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up message ("wsignoutcleanup1.0").
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出登出是否由識別提供者 (IP) 透過 WS-同盟登出清除訊息 ("wsignoutcleanup1.0") 所啟始。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if sign-out was initiated by the IP; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果登出是由 IP 啟始的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In an event handler, you can use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A> property to determine whether the sign-out was initiated by the IP (a sign-out clean-up request message was received by the RP), or whether the sign-out was initiated by the relying party (RP).
trans-unit.target: 在事件處理常式，您可以使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A>屬性來判斷是否登出由所起始的 IP （登出清除要求訊息已收到 RP），或是否登出由所起始的信賴憑證者的合作對象 (RP)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs" /> that indicates sign-out was initiated by the relying party (RP).
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs" />，表示登出是由信賴憑證者 (RP) 所啟始。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs" /> that has its <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated" /> property set <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 其 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="false" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated" />。
